definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Researches on the two-photon photopolymerization technology of a Zr-based inorganic-organic hybrid material have been processed.
sentences.chinese: 飞秒激光掺锆有机无机杂化材料双光子聚合工艺研究。

sentences.english: Researches on the two-photon photopolymerization technology of SU8 negative photoresist have been processed.
sentences.chinese: 飞秒激光SU8负性光刻胶双光子聚合工艺研究。

sentences.english: Photon Cannons, or the little hand thingies.
sentences.chinese: 光子炮，便是那个小手一律澳门新澳门赌场东西。

sentences.english: We count the number of photos arriving at D1 without the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 我们对没有放入镜子时达D1的光子进行计数。

sentences.english: In this sense photons differ very much from little grains or bullets of matter .
sentences.chinese: 在这个意义上，光子大大不同于物质的细粒或小丸。

sentences.english: The two-photon vector model is established and applied to the analyses.
sentences.chinese: 在分析过程中建立和运用了双光子矢量模型。

sentences.english: Characteristics of infrared multiphoton dissociation of ethanol molecules were investigated experimentally.
sentences.chinese: 实验研究了乙醇分子的红外多光子离解特性。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the hair-removal effect of intense pulsed light (IPL).
sentences.chinese: 目的观察强脉冲光子的脱毛效果。

sentences.english: So in some sense, in this sort of situation, the photons should be considered one of the reactants.
sentences.chinese: 这种条件在某种意义下，应该把光子也当做反应物。

sentences.english: This sort of sub-photon is discovered in the dark energy ten years ago.
sentences.chinese: 这种亚光子是十年前在暗能量中才发现的。

sentences.english: After the lepton era, its number density would be higher than that of baryon by a factor of about 109.
sentences.chinese: 中微子是唯一的始终可与光子数密度相比拟的粒子。

sentences.english: Some of the energy intended for the photon is drained off by the recoiling atom.
sentences.chinese: 原来给予光子的能量有一部分为反冲原子所消耗。

sentences.english: We have further developed the multi-photon interference techniques.
sentences.chinese: 我们在实验上进一步发展了多光子纠缠源技术。

sentences.english: Electro - optic ( EO ) materials are a new class of information materials based on photonics.
sentences.chinese: 电光材料是以光子为载体的新一代信息材料。

sentences.english: When an atom shoots out a photon of light, it recoils like a gun.
sentences.chinese: 原子发出光子时，会象枪一样地反冲。

sentences.english: The beam splitter based on photonic crystal waveguides is taken as an essential component in integrated optical circuits.
sentences.chinese: 光子晶体波导分束器是集成光学电路的重要组成元件。

definition: neutrino (particle physics)/also written 微中子[wei1 zhong1 zi3]
